CTR.Q: What type of chart is this?

VEC.Q: How many series are represented in this stream chart?

SRP.Q: What is the vertical (above/below) relationship of the area representing Apex Systems relative to Vanguard Dynamics?
SRP.A: Apex Systems is {below} Vanguard Dynamics in the vertical direction.

SRP.Q: What is the vertical (above/below) relationship of the area representing Vanguard Dynamics relative to Apex Systems?
SRP.A: Vanguard Dynamics is {above} Apex Systems in the vertical direction.

SRP.Q: What is the vertical (above/below) relationship of the area representing Aegis Corp relative to Horizon Enterprises?
SRP.A: Aegis Corp is {above} Horizon Enterprises in the vertical direction.

VPR.Q: Which series contributes the largest portion to the total debt to equity ratio?
VPR.A: The series with the largest contribution is {Apex Systems}.

VPR.Q: Which series contributes the smallest portion to the total debt to equity ratio?
VPR.A: The series with the smallest contribution is {Horizon Enterprises}.

EVJ.Q: Which year is Apex Systems's minimum Debt to Equity Ratio in the streamgraph?
EVJ.A: Apex Systems's minimum Debt to Equity Ratio is in {1981}.

EVJ.Q: Which year is Apex Systems's maximum Debt to Equity Ratio in the streamgraph?
EVJ.A: Apex Systems's maximum Debt to Equity Ratio is in {2005}.

NC.Q: Was the total Debt to Equity Ratio in 1983 higher or lower than in 2004?
NC.A: The total debt to equity ratio in 1983 was {lower} than in 2004.

NC.Q: Was the total Debt to Equity Ratio in 1983 higher or lower than in 1996?
NC.A: The total debt to equity ratio in 1983 was {lower} than in 1996.

NC.Q: Between 1982 and 2000, did the total Debt to Equity Ratio experience a larger or smaller change than between 1983 and 1996?
NC.A: The change in total debt to equity ratio between 1982 and 2000 was {larger} than between 1983 and 1996.

NC.Q: Between 1996 and 2003, did the total Debt to Equity Ratio experience a larger or smaller change than between 1990 and 1991?
NC.A: The change in total debt to equity ratio between 1996 and 2003 was {larger} than between 1990 and 1991.

MSR.Q: In this streamgraph, which one held the dominant position for the longest period of time?
MSR.A: {Apex Systems} held the dominant position for the longest period of time.

MSR.Q: In this streamgraph, in which year did Aegis Corp and Horizon Enterprises first exchange dominant positions?
MSR.A: Aegis Corp and Horizon Enterprises first exchanged leading positions in {1983}.
